data.name: PuckOFF
data.detailed_description:
❄️ The PuckOFF competition immerses players in an atmospheric street hockey game with the ability to hit opponents. The game is designed as a cooperative sports simulator, where you can complete the story campaign in single-player or multiplayer mode. Users will take part in a tournament where there are no rules. You will have to fight off the attacks of your opponents, trying to score goals on the tough street goalies.
Story progresses through levels in a sports career, facing opponents of varying difficulty. Unlock new types of equipment and accessories that allow you to customize the protagonist. Players will also be able to hone their hero's skills along the way, creating their own build. Users have to travel around the world and go through hockey games to find the mysterious and legendary player Dominator.

❄️ Gamers will gradually build up a reputation for their team, gaining access to prestigious leagues. The competition takes place in an area of a small lake that is covered in ice. The gameplay is filled with dynamic events, where you need to keep a close eye on the situation on the field and react quickly. The character will be able to hit, smash and grind enemy hockey players, as well as perform the basic elements of hockey.

In PuckOFF you will...

  • ⛸️ Put your skates on and play "no rules pond hockey" in beautiful environments
  • 🏅 Unlock new gear and bosses while trying to figure out how to hockey
  • 🏒 Decide the type of player you want to be by boosting the skills you value the most
  • 🚌 Travel around the world in search for the mysterious Dominator

Unique hockey experience

🏆Build your legacy and rise in the ranks to demolish your opponents while uncovering the story of the ultimate goon. In your travels you will meet new people, and face bosses that reguire different strategies to be able to beat them. Crazy matches, fast-paced action and unfairly tough opponents are a sure way to loose the last drops of your sanity. Rules are meant to be broken.

🌎 Initial launch will have four chapters of our campaign. More chapters will be updated to the game on regular basis. Story will hold 11 chapters.



🥅 Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/q4sDV5HycV

🎮 From one to up to four players. 🎮🎮🎮🎮

PuckOFF!

VERSION 1.0 -13.5.2022-
  • Campaign with the first four chapters (+prologue chapter).
  • Germany, Switzerland, Slovakia & Czech Republic are first countries to conquer.
  • Quickplay where you can play alone or with your friends using either characters you've created or bosses you've unlocked.
  • In celebration of hockey world championship games, we added an international tournament mode with 40 countries to represent

    NORDIC VERSION -29.5.2022-
    • Sweden and Finland as playable levels + their bosses
    • Captain Crown + Eagle storyline added

data.short_description: PuckOFF is a seriously unforgiving hockey goon simulator missing one thing: rules. You can do whatever it takes to win a game and you have different ways to do so; you can either outscore or outlast your opponents. Except lots of cheap shots and opponents who won't hesitate to put you down.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 with 2.8 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce® GTX™ 560 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 with 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX™ 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
